synopsis.text: Double-life high schooler Misuzu Moritani hides a secret: she can freeze time for three minutes each day. This introverted girl uses her power to escape uncomfortable social situations, but everything changes when she discovers that popular classmate Haruka Murakami is immune to her ability. Caught in an awkward moment, Misuzu finds herself forming an unexpected bond with Haruka. As they navigate their unique circumstances, the two girls learn that even though time may stand still, their feelings and personal growth cannot be paused. Join Misuzu and Haruka in "Fragtime" as they explore friendship, love, and the reality that time waits for no one.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
